text: Tamen wen ni [mu sheng] yinjiu he dubo [zhu][de duan fa], ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Zhe liang jian shi zhong dou you zhongda de zui'e, jinguan dui renlei yeyou yixie yichu, dan qi zuiguo bi qi yichu geng da.” Tamen wen ni tamen ying shishe shenme, ni [dui tamen] shuo:“[Nimen ying shishe] duoyu de.” An la ruci wei nimen chanming ta de falu, yibian nimen shensi
